title: Finally played with a Yasuo I didn't hate
body:
In two years, this was the first time I have ever seen a Yasuo that helped other lanes early, grouped when appropriate, split when appropriate and was also nice in chat.

Two Years. TWO YEARS.

One worthy Yasuo. His KDA ended 7/7/7, as if to symbolize how incredibly lucky I was to have such a Yasuo.

replies.body: i stopped playing yasuo, because of the stigma, thats why most rivens yasuos etc champs are 80% cancer, no one wants to play a champion with a perceived personality if it doesnt fit them, thats why im a talon main now, all i care about is those sweet, stylish, fade away kills
I know, its a rarity only few are graced with.
The better players tend to be the more humble ones. Unless you're doublelift.
